column1: Topic title: Malaysiakini is not pro DAP  pro opposition

column8: and choosing not to see the content
Kesian Malaysiakini - 2008 was a hard lesson for them
Lolz. Malaysia kini will be malaysian insider soon
pro opposition tak per asal jangan  siar berita palsu.. how many times utushit kena bayar DAP .. how many times Malaysia kini had to pay BN leaders?

Utusan: Malaysiakini a threat to national interestMkini 29 Apr 2017 SoS...The news portal poses threat to the people’s mind, declares the Umno-owned daily....Malay daily Utusan Malaysia has launched yet another scathing attack on Malaysiakini, this time declaring that the news portal poses a "threat" to the mind of the people....The article, cobbled together with quotes from two obscure NGOs, complains that the nearly 15-year-old news portal has no sense of responsibility, often reporting news without facts.

Print versions of Mkini, FZ would 'confuse people'Mkini 27 Mar 2014 SoS...Hence, the minister says their applications were rejected....News portals Malaysiakini and FZ.com both had their newspaper permits rejected in order to avoid the public "being confused" by "too many" newspapers flooding the marketplace, Home Minister Ahmad Zahid Hamidi said.
to me both mykini and utushit is shit
malaysiakini is to oppo what utusan is to bn, too bias to be taken seriously

column7: From: Hurr Durr Herp Derp Land
column8: and yet many still gullible to protect it
i am the queen of United Kingdom. i swim in milk and oreos everyday.
